trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of related sections within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di sezioni correlate in un file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationSectionCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe ConfigurationSectionCollection per scorrere una raccolta di <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>oggetti.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Sections%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere a questa raccolta di oggetti utilizzando il <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Sections%2A>proprietà o <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Sections%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionCollection class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class.
trans-unit.target: La classe ConfigurationSectionCollection viene utilizzata anche per la creazione di tipi personalizzati che estendono la <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> dell'oggetto per il <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, questo metodo aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>oggetto se non è già contenuto all'interno della raccolta.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the section to be added.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della sezione da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The section to be added.
trans-unit.target: La sezione da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Clears this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: Copia questo <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto in una matrice.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object to.
trans-unit.target: Matrice in cui copiare la <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: Posizione di indice in corrispondenza del quale iniziare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: The length of array is less than the value of plus index.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di array è minore del valore di più index .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of sections in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di sezioni in questo <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the number of sections in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che rappresenta il numero di sezioni nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> contenuto nell'oggetto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> contenuto nell'oggetto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto con il nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: name is null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameè null o una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un enumeratore che scorre questo <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>che può essere utilizzato per scorrere l'oggetto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la chiave dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> contenuto nell'oggetto <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object whose key is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto la cui chiave è da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: La chiave della <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Used by the system during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato dal sistema durante la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetObjectData viene utilizzato durante la serializzazione; ovvero, quando il mantenimento dati di configurazione in un file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'applicabili <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.
trans-unit.target: L'applicabili <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>oggetto.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This property gets the specified entry of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà ottiene la voce specificata del <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: In c#, questa proprietà è l'indicizzatore per la <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This property gets the specified entry of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà ottiene la voce specificata del <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: In c#, questa proprietà è l'indicizzatore per la <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto con il nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys to all <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le chiavi per tutti <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> gli oggetti contenuti in questa <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection> object that contains the keys of all sections in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>oggetto che contiene le chiavi di tutte le sezioni in questa raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto da questo <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The name of the section to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della sezione da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"> </xref> oggetto da questo <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Indice della sezione da rimuovere.
